title: FS:  T206 PSA 4 High End (Seriously) * ALL SOLD *
author: sreader3

posts.post_title: FS:  T206 PSA 4 High End (Seriously) * ALL SOLD *
posts.post_content:
Bresnahan (Portrait) SC 350/30 -- Beautiful.  Submitted raw and expected to come back in a 6 or 6.5 holder.  Oh well.  Crack and resubmit or cross to SGC for 1- to 2-point bump?  SOLD

Marquard (Follow Through) SC 460/42 OS -- Nice card for the grade.  SOLD

Wagner (Bat on Right) P 460/25 -- Super sharp.  Downgraded mainly due to upper right corner ding.  SOLD

Prices include shipping and insurance.  Personal check or paypal gift.

First committed email gets the card.  sarpc at qwestoffice dot net.

Thanks.

Scot

Scot,

I'll take the Breshnahan.
It sure looks nice.

Hank
Hank, Sorry someone beat you to Bres. Scot
